title: Cutie Honey '21
description:
Cutie Honey for the 21st Century.
Seiko Hayami a private detective and her partner Hisashi Hanyu, are tasked with solving the cases that the police canâ€™t handle. What they soon uncover is a seedy underbelly of crime perpetrated by an organization that can turn humans into monsters. 
With Seiko being overwhelmed by these outrageous cases will a hero arise to help in her stead?
A warrior of love only heard from stories long ago.

[Source: MangaUpdates]
